website_summaries.verdict: This deluxe mattress offers a superb combination of style and function.
pros: Includes BioFoam, a memory foam substitute designed to keep the mattress fresh for an extended period of time
Features fabric-knitted jacquard fabric that guarantees exceptional quality
Immediately molds to the shape of the body
cons: Less durable than many comparable mattresses

customer_reviews.title: Fiberglass!!!
customer_reviews.text: Furious. If I could give no stars I would. Took the mattress cover off to wash it and there's fiberglass everywhere!!! Beware! Do not buy. My kids and I are covered in it!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Willobee

customer_reviews.title: Fiberglass shards
customer_reviews.text: The cover has a layer of fiberglass that will start to fall apart and poke out everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: JustSomeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Beware Health Hazard!!
customer_reviews.text: The cover for this mattress is made up of 62% fiberglass in the form of tiny shards of dust like particles which can get on everything in your house, your car, clothes, etc. Fiberglass is an irritant and many medical professionals believe that it can cause cancer. Small particles like those found in this mattress can be inhaled, embedded in the pores of your skin, etc.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Glass like particles
customer_reviews.text: My son complained and thought the mattress had bed bugs because of the itching. No bugs, it was Fiberglass particles coming from mattress. Emailed customer support who told Me to trash it immediately but then they didn’t respond to my replacement. So now we will go the weekend without a mattress, plus had to trash the sheets and comforter.
customer_reviews.author: malinda matthews

customer_reviews.title: RESEARCH BEFORE YOU BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY—- fibers on these mattress will make your life miserable. We were experiencing a lot of issues, from sore throats, irritation, allergy like symptoms, and I have a 9 month old baby now with a rash all over his body and feeling miserable. We had no idea what it was until now. There are fiberglass like things all over from this mattress. We’ve had this mattress a little over a year. Now I have to deal with cleaning and disposing of a lot of things that are beyond salvageable.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pino

customer_reviews.title: Corners are flat :(
customer_reviews.text: I like the mattress but the corners are flat. I'd say they narrow down to 2"- makes the fitted sheet almost impossible to stay pu.t
customer_reviews.author: Chloedpd

customer_reviews.title: Causes lung problems, avoid!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is a fire-retardant barrier made of fiberglass that will eventually disintentegrate and pollute your home. My lungs have already been affected, as now I am short of breath, experiencing lung pain and coughing up more and more material. The sad thing is I spent years trying be healthy and now, I have seen the thing that will most likely kill me. I have attempted to clean the room of these tiny fiberglass fibers but at this point the contamination is so bad we may have to throw out the entire bed, possibly move out, and start over. Avoid this product, it is very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Warranty Zinus won't get behind
customer_reviews.text: I regret this purchase. Amazon doesn't allow a return since it can't be recompressed and kicks you over to Zinus. Zinus says it's a purchase from Amazon. A warranty means nothing if there's no one behind it.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Faulty and can’t get money back! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: One corner never inflated, and the entire mattress only inflated to about 5 inches. Save your money and buy a better quality mattress. I also got persuaded by the reviews, but even after filing a complaint I only was told to return it for a refund. Now I need to figure out how to repack this into a box and return it! Complete waste of money, time and energy.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: My son falls asleep so much faster!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is insanely comfortable. We bought it for our toddler's first twin bed and we regularly almost fall asleep on it ourselves. Our son usually sleeps through the night but he used to take a long time to fall asleep when he was on a crib mattress. Ever since we got this new mattress he falls asleep in at least half the time!
customer_reviews.author: npay222

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress for the price! HANDS DOWN!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why people gave 1-star reviews to this queen mattress. Yes, it may take more than the Prime 2-day shipping but for the price and comfort, you can't beat it! I waited 12 hours for the mattress to expand (it was around 10 inches) and when I laid down to sleep, I felt myself sink a little more than an inch into the foam (I'm 160 lbs). I can't remember the last time I slept so well on 6 hours of sleep! Would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: ehinsa

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress in 2016 under the name Sleep Master Ultima Comfort Memory Foam 6 Inch Mattress, Twin. It worked very well for us. We purchased another one in Feb 2018. This is not the same mattress. It is thin and you can feel the metal bars of the bed frame when you sit or lay down on it. Even though the original one is two years older it is more sturdy and does not sink in when even an adult lays on it. This one does not hold up under the slightest weight. We purchased as a temporary mattress for a two year old.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Get The Thicker Option!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d paid more for the 10 or 12 inch. The 8” is okay, but more firm than I expected it to be. If you like a softer mattress or are overweight/have back pain, go for a thicker option! Thinner = more firm, Thicker = Softer. You spend 30%+ of your life in bed, May as well get a good one! I would definitely buy this mattress again, but like I said, a 10 or 12”
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Much better sleep
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded size (From full to queen), but downgraded in thickness, and I am glad I did. My previous full size 12 inch mattress, while comfortable to begin with, became extremely uncomfortable after getting used to sleeping on it after a few weeks. It was too much cushion for me. It also made things difficult during intimate activities in a certain way because you would sink into the memory foam too much in certain positions and over exert yourself and get tired or sore way to quick. This bed it perfect though. Love the soft but firm feel to it when sleeping or playing.
customer_reviews.author: jmcgouldrick

customer_reviews.title: At first this mattress was very very firm and was like sleeping in a dream
customer_reviews.text: I waited so long to review this mattress because as with all mattress, it takes a while to see how it will last. At first this mattress was very very firm and was like sleeping in a dream. But now, 5 months later, there are definitely impressions on both sides of the bed where we sleep and a noticeable "hump" in the middle. I am starting to get backaches again. :/ My recommendation would be to just save up and buy the higher priced one because if not, you are going to spend more in the long run replacing this type of mattress every 6 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: SCahill

customer_reviews.title: Um?
customer_reviews.text: This arrived fine as expected got it in the house and out of the hospital, it took two of us to get the matress condom off so it could unroll and begin decompression. All seemed fine. Well it's not, there is no memory foam, at first I was like no, no way. Well, yeah... It's incomplete, just a slab of the dense stuff, they forgot the rest of the matress, aka the memory foam. I don't really know what to do now, there is no compressing it to send it back so....
customer_reviews.author: B.P/K.P

customer_reviews.title: Safety Hazard? Smells Like Mildew/Spores
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and was initially excited, I opened it and it smelled like bamboo or whatever but it didnt have a bad mildew smell to it (or the bamboo smell over powered it at first) so I just let it air out for like 4 days in a empty room I have and put it up and when I lay down you can smell this nasty mildew smell that wont go away. The smell is not a smell you can ignore, the smell make me sick. I cant recommend this bed from my personal experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the best single purchase from Amazon ever
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it would be an alright bed but boy was I wrong. Seriously the best single purchase from Amazon ever!! I have been sleeping on this bed for over 2 months and it's the best mattress I've ever had. Came on time, easy freaking setup and the most comfy sleep ever. Is on the firm side but that's exactly how I like it. No back pain ever.
customer_reviews.author: Chani Thorum

customer_reviews.title: Great product I've made a great choice
customer_reviews.text: Speechless with this mattress, I put of buying it for a few reasons but looking at the video and many good reviews I said to myself why not let me try it. I am extremely happy I sleep better and has help with how I sleep and back pains. Thanks! And the money is just right for someone like me on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Santi

customer_reviews.title: I bought this mattress once before and it was amazing but this time around the smell is horrid
customer_reviews.text: There is a STRONG chemical smell. I bought this mattress once before and it was amazing but this time around the smell is horrid. It definitely wasn't like this before. I purposely got this because of the way it was packaged because I live in An apartment building and getting a mattress bigger than a twin into my elevator would have been impossible. So now that it's all unrolled I'm stuck with this chemically smelling mattress in my apartment. I don't know what happened, I bought the same mattress from this company about 3 years ago and loved it but this second one stinks
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Wirecutter and Sleep Like the Dead recommend this mattress and I’ve found it very comfortable in daily use for a couple of months. I bought the same brand frame. I believe and sympathize with those who have been through hell when fiberglass fibers escaped, but that can not happen if you do not unzip the built in cover. (Pretend the zipper does not exist. It is NOT meant to be opened.) For insurance I have enclosed the mattress in a micro polyester enclosure and intend never to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: BDG

customer_reviews.title: Love These!! Well Worth the Price, Don't listen to negative reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for my 8 and 9-year-old. I personally use a Tempur-Pedic but I wasn't going to spend that kind of money again. The funny thing is I like these better! They are soft and comfy. My children absolutely love them!! They were easy to set up, came packaged very very well and I had NO STINK! My Tempur-Pedic smelled for 2 months! people that complain about the funny smell don't understand the game. It's not a sigh of a cheap Chinese made product, it just is what it is. These are completely worth the price, grab a good waterproof cover and you are good to go! I highly recommend the covers from IKEA
customer_reviews.author: Randall BryanTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Fiber glass
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this...I’ve had this mattress for a little over a year and I almost bought another one until I took off the cover and found fiber glass everywhere. It got into my sheets and my body has been itchy and irritated. Waste of money that could have been spent on an honest, safe, and high quality mattress. It’s just plain sad companies do this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachele Petit

customer_reviews.title: Never buying this brand again
customer_reviews.text: When we purchased the mattress we went based off of photos of it in the comments and the reviews as we do all things. What we got is not what other people received. What we got was not a six inch mattress but a two inch mattress. I'm super disappointed and now have had to spend another $100 on a different mattress so that my daughter can have a bed. At this point we don't know if we're going to use this as one hell of an expensive cushion topper or if we're going to return it for a refund. We're going to wait for the new mattress to get here to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy T

customer_reviews.title: Nonplussed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this bed. This is the first memory foam bed I have owned. If you run hot, this is not a good bed for you as the foam retains heat. I bought this thinking the 100 day tryout policy on the Zinus website would be honored, but that is not the case. Zinus will only accept it as a return if you purchase it directly from them, so buyer beware. The bed is not terribly uncomfortable, but the adage that you get what you pay for does come to mind. I will likely replace this bed with something more to my liking in the coming year.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Took some time getting used to. I had another brand of memory foam that I used as a topper that was so comfortable but needed one that was bigger to use as a mattress. This one was a bit denser than I wanted because I am using it on an adjustable bed. Either I'm getting used to it or it's getting softer because I'm not complaining about it any more so maybe it was just me. Whatever the case, it's working fine for me now.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate - Feels hot and started feeling stiff back
customer_reviews.text: I have read amazing reviews by fellow customers and was excited to get this. However having used it for more than 6 months now I am thinking to get rid of this and for regular mattress. I am not sure if I got a defective product or its the nature of memory foam mattress but its hot to the touch and off late started getting back pains. I ignore it in the beginning but its getting more pronounced. Might have to place it in a day bed or a spare seating area...somewhere in the house. Just wanted to share with people if in case some of you sleep hot...this might not be the best option for you.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra_S(Atlanta)

customer_reviews.title: i WAS NOT EXPECTING
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time of purchasing budget memory foam matters, first one was 6 year ago and I was happy with it. my purchase of this brand was basically base on high rated customer reviews but it is not working for me at all it is 3 months now and I am not happy with it at all. I wish I returned it in beginning but I thought I will get used to it or will adjust to it if give more time. One more thing if you own platform frame like I do this matters move freely around unlike my old one and it is really annoying since wont stick to bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: A very nice, soft foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: A very nice, soft foam mattress. The odor has lingered a little but my husband likes the plastic smell so the mattress wasn't aired longer than it took to inflate properly. A good price for a plush mattress. Surprise side benefit is that my husband suffers from a lot of muscle and some arthritic pain and when he lays on the mattress a lot of his pain fades away. It seems that the soft but supportive foam helps prevent pain from pressure points etc. We are very pleased and would absolutely buy again. Update: after 3 months, we still love it. It holds its shape well and is very comfortable. The odor did linger for a while however.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Scent is too strong.
customer_reviews.text: The chemical smell is too strong. We've aired it out for weeks. Still smells. You can smell it as soon as you walk into the room. Put sheets over it and you'll still be able to smell the mattress when you're near it. This is a no go. I want fresh air while I sleep.
customer_reviews.author: rachelmaechel

customer_reviews.title: A year and a half out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress a little over a year ago. It's already sagging in the two spots we sleep in and is very uncomfortable. You cannot flip it over or rotate it to alleviate the problem. If you are thinking of buying this, save up some more money and buy something else. Otherwise in a year or two you will be waking up achy and wishing you had.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! FIBERGLASS MATTRESS! SKIN AND BREATHING ISSUES!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I've been spending thousands of dollars on Drs, medicines, new detergents, new clothing, sheets... all for my daughter who's been having allergy type symptoms, breathing trouble and skin issues. She told me about shards in the air after she washed the cover and I told her "No way do they make mattresses with fiber glass!" I pulled up the reviews to prove to her that couldn't possible be the issue and I'm sick to my stomach that she's been dealing with this for MONTHS and this company cares so little as to put such a dangerous product on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Chews LIfe

customer_reviews.title: GOOD NIGHT
customer_reviews.text: This Zinus 8 Inch Ultima Memory Foam Mattress will give and continue to give you a good night of sleep. This is the second one I have purchased - the first one I purchased for my son's bed and after feeling what it is like, I had to have one for me and my husband. Out of the box/wrapping there is not odor/smell and after it expands just enjoy the comfort of a good mattress that gives you a good night of sleep and that makes you not want to get out bed - I highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: happyday

customer_reviews.title: Fiber glass itch aweful
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this mattress a little over a year and for the last 6 months it has been bothering my son we finally figured out what was wrong The cover that it comes in is made of fiberglass and he has had itchy rashes finally the mattress went in the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Primeaddict

customer_reviews.title: Firm yet soft
customer_reviews.text: Really unsure what to expect from a mattress bought online, especially for such an inexpensive price. We chose the 10 inch for our boys' room and purchased two twin mattresses. It paired perfectly with the zinus bed frames. It is a firm mattress but still has some give so you don't feel like you are sleeping on concrete. My boys, age 7 and 6, love their new beds! We aired them out for about 5 days and there was still a very faint smell. BUT we just purchased SUPER expensive Sealy Posturpedic mattresses and the chemical smell on those lasted way longer.
customer_reviews.author: CameraGear

customer_reviews.title: Comparable To 'Purple' At 1/3 The Price...!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using high quality foam type mattresses for 18 years. Zinus is definitely the highest quality and lowest price mattress we've purchased. In fact, we purchased 1, the were so pleased we purchased 3 more. I would put them at the exact same quality level as the brand 'Purple', except Purple is more than 3x the price. Three of us loved the Zinus just the way they came. One added an additional 'memory foam' to theirs We also added the Handy brand mattress covers to our beds. Completely water proof. A great combination:  I highly recommend the Zinus frames and mattresses. Both are extremely well made. Very surprised...
customer_reviews.author: Rantasia

customer_reviews.title: in couch form on the futon, use rubber matts or use the cardboard box it came in
customer_reviews.text: for all the nay-sayers: this works great with a futon. it folds into a couch and stays (my trick was using the cardboard box it came in underneath the grates. it is so much more comfortable than the futon. my dad would sit on it for years with extra pillows and wouldn’t let me change it because he didn’t want it to be a burden and would put up with the uncomfortableness. i hope he is pleasantly surprised, because my mother and i love it.
customer_reviews.author: LuciousBrown93

customer_reviews.title: I updated my review from 4 stars to 1 stars
customer_reviews.text: I had one very similar before, also from zinus. I liked it a lot. I couldn't bring it with me when I moved, and it is no more available. I found this one, basically the same products. It's been about 2 weeks after it was unfolded. Most part of the bed has fully risen, except the top and bottom edge. I hope they will eventually inflated, like my old bed. I like the firmness of the bed, no odor at all. Updated after 6 weeks: the top and bottom edge never fully unfolded. one of the side edge raised unevenly—which bother me the most.
customer_reviews.author: Wuhang Lin

customer_reviews.title: I opened it and it would have been ready to sleep on within a few hours if not for the horrible mildew smell
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too sure what so many people were complaining about the thickness of the mattress and how long it took to expand, I opened it and it would have been ready to sleep on within a few hours if not for the horrible mildew smell. Some people were complaining about their mattress smelling like "chemicals:, mine smelled like straight up mildew, took several weeks for it to go away. I put the mattress in the garage for awhile so it didn't stink up the rest of the house (it was that bad). After that I brought it upstairs and it is being used as a daybed mattress. I'm 275 lbs and sleep just fine on it.
customer_reviews.author: aric londrie

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed in my purchase. I had previously purchased this mattress and loved it. Unfortunately, this was not the case this second time around. It isn’t firm...it actually sinks in too much. Unwrapped the mattress as advices and let it unfold to its potential fullness. Slept on it for two weeks...hoping that it would improve, but no change at all. Not comfortable at all!! Would like to return or possibly get an exchange (thinking that maybe this mattress was defective) but once the mattress is out of the box...how can I return it?? It’s too big...no free returns or exchanges!! Now I have to figure out what to do with the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rock of my domain

customer_reviews.title: NOT the same as the first 4 we ordered
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the first 4 memory foam 8" mattresses from Amazon so when we needed another, it was a easy decision. I looked up the previous order and purchased another one. It's been a horrible decision. The new one arrived on time and I carefully opened the box, waiting for it to expand to 8" like the others. NOT. The box claims it a 8" matters but it's only 6" thick ands so soft, you can feel the plywood support when you sit on it. I noted the problem and asked for a return/replacement but the next one is exactly the same as the first. Unless you love camping and sleeping on the ground, do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: D. SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: The issue I have with this mattress is, it was amazing for a short period of time...now its sagging on both sides. I sleep on it alone, every week I turn it because I feel like I'm falling off of it. I've had this brand previously, and it lasted probably 7 years. Actually, I still have it in my guest room, it's just a little softer now. This one, I'm so mad at! I need a new one already after 6 or so months.
customer_reviews.author: Dee K.

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings but I would say do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This 8" mattress only 6 1/2 inches. Although not what I ordered, I can live with it. However I also bought the 6" which is only 4", skinny as can be. I would rate it a zero if I could.. I sent a note to the seller and heard nothing. I called Amazon and they were great after I spoke with a rep who handles just mattresses and furniture. If you have a problem, ask to speak with that special department.
customer_reviews.author: Brownie45

customer_reviews.title: FIber Glass Fibers Leak out of Mattress Cover Over Time
customer_reviews.text: Super unsafe with fiberglass material coming out of the thing onto my sheets and property over time. The mattress is very comfortable if you do not mind the potential health threat. Amazon will not refund me because it's out of the refund window and Zinus wants to send me another mattress that I do not feel safe using. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaE0419

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mattress!
customer_reviews.text: What a great bed!! I saw a lot of mixed reviews so I was scared to make this purchase but there’s nothing to worry about! Let it be for a day after you unfold it and it’s ready to go. Super comfortable! Not too firm yet not bouncy or too soft, you don’t sink in it all at and I have a metal bed-frame. Can’t feel the metal bars at all since I don’t have a box spring or anything under the mattress. No one would believe me when I told them the price after they said my bed was so comfortable! Definitely get this mattress it’s worth it 100% for the cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: When is a 6" a 4"!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both 6" and 8" mattresses. The 8" is 6 1/2 " and looks like it will hold an adult no problem. I can live with it but the 6" mattress is just 4" high, not good!! They have both been laying flat for 4 days now even though the instructions say to lay them flat for 48 hours. Have no idea how to send it back. Spoke with Amazon's Customer Service and not only are they arranging for a replacement with a 6" but they are arranging for UPS to pick up the mattress and wrap it in a box, Can't be more pleased with Amazon's Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: Brownie45

customer_reviews.title: and I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning this product, and the first night I slept on it the middle of the mattress sunken, I weigh under 150 lbs. Its wayyyy too soft, and I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sijoya

customer_reviews.title: I favor Zinus Brand for all my sleeping mattress in my home.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bedding in light of the fact that the quality it is comprised of and I feel exceptionally cool on this sleeping mattress and it doesn't get warm, the gel inside this sleeping cushion help to keep the sleeping mattress cool and it swell precisely the size I requested. furthermore, this is my fourth sleeping cushion in my home for all the rooms
customer_reviews.author: Srikanth

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable in the long term
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress now for about 7 months and it's progressively gotten more uncomfortable. My low back aches in the morning after sleeping for 6-7 hours, my husband has pressure points in his hips if he lays on his side on this mattress. I would not buy this mattress again. I can't believe it's been less than a year and we need a new mattress already.
customer_reviews.author: JAA2208

customer_reviews.title: Waste of your money! Review after 6 months, my back is in extreme pain
customer_reviews.text: The 1st month wasn’t so bad but the quality of my sleep has gradually worsen. Since owning this mattress, I have had constant back pain, a lot of tension in my neck and shoulders and frequent headaches. The mattress has soften and you sink into the mattress unevenly. I feel restless every morning I wake up and have a very tough time falling asleep. I bought it cause of the price and reviews but am questioning how truthful these reviews are. I have now invested in a more expensive mattress and I cannot wait to get rid of this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: 5 star mattress for the young and  seasoned individuals!
customer_reviews.text: 5 star mattress for the young and seasoned individuals. Purchased over a couple of years ago. To use in the spare bedroom. Everyone loves this mattress. Been stated by family members whom spent the night on it, "amazing". I'm going to buy another for our bed since, it helps with aches and pains in our seasoned bodies. Zinus keep the price where it's at because that is another selling point of product. Do not change anything about this mattress. Like its been said if it's not broken, dont fix it. This mattress beats are Serta pillow top any day.
customer_reviews.author: Keepitsimple

customer_reviews.title: Absolute JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Ultimate garbage. Zero stars. Its certainly not a 6" memory foam mattress. Its a 4" plain foam mattress TOPPER that you can get at Walmart for half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: Hit or Miss
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 6 inch mattress to use a mattress topper in 2016 and its great. It inflated to size within minutes of opening the packaging. I decided to purchase another one this year for my daughter and was terribly disappointed. When I opened the package it barely inflated 2 inches. I allowed it to sit for over 72 hours and it only inflated another inch and a half at best in the middle and on corner. The other three corners are about 2 1/2 inches and are very stiff and pointy. I guess you have a 50/50 chance of actually getting a good mattress from this company. I am returning this mattress for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Markus collier

customer_reviews.title: Boxed Mattresses - - - your time has come
customer_reviews.text: Size---10" just right. Softness of protective cover. Ease of order and delivery. Very comfortable. No comparison to our $3500 icomfort. Rather have serial---AFFORDABLE - - - - - mattresses every few years THAN spend outrageous $$$$on mattress that has to be replaced every few years anyway. Mattress in box, your time has come - - - - and what a relief. No guilt about frequent replacement. Both my adult children replaced theirs at same time. ALL very satisfied. BTW don't need to get an expensive leesa or Caspar. $350. is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly light and super comfortable (I have a herniated disc)
customer_reviews.text: Feels light. Not firm but very comfortable. Full size for $170. Instructions said leave out for 24-48 hours, so it fully expands and any smell subsides. Straight out the box mine had no smell and was very easy to unfold. I'm 5'4" and have a bad back, but was able to take it out the box and plastic, unfold it, and place it on table* by myself; where I left it to air in front of windows. *I placed it on my blanket covered dining room table because I didn't have enough space in my apartment for it to lay flat while I slept on my old mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Order directly from Zinus’ website NOT FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: We’ve ordered a king size mattress directly from Zinus before and LOVED it. When we moved, we didn’t move with our old mattress so we needed a mattress quick. It was quicker to prime this mattress than order from Zinus. It was supposed to be the same kind as our previous mattress but let me tell you, it’s not. My husband and I sleep terribly on this thing and it kills our back and we’ve only had it 6 Months. I will be replacing this and ordering from the actual Zinus site. Do not be like us! Order directly from Zinus. There’s a huge difference in mattress quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Laster

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable I could live in it
customer_reviews.text: I had a medium firm bed for I bought this one and I bought it because my boyfriend has night terror and he kicks and punches I am very pleased with this purchase as is my boyfriend I have mostly metal in my leg And I have hip dysplasia and fibromyalgia as well as severe arthritis at 33 so this bed is made my life so much easier sometimes I just don’t want to get out of bed and I lay there for hours I have a TV on the side of my room that I can pull close to me so please please please purchase this bed
customer_reviews.author: Shelly G.

customer_reviews.title: A really impressive mattress at a low cost.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a twin for the daybed in our guest room. After it was through expanding, I laid down on it to give it a test & fell asleep (without meaning to!). I did wake up a few hours later with my arm asleep (which never happens to me), not sure if it was the mattress though. Overall, I find this mattress to be very comfortable & a great value. Have a house guest coming next week for a week. Will update with their experience. 11/7/17 Update- Have had several guests sleep on this mattress & had a good night's sleep. My mom liked it so much that I might buy her one for Christmas! :)
customer_reviews.author: Avonlea

customer_reviews.title: Bad foam, poor warranty
customer_reviews.text: I started having issues with this mattress about 3 months in. The foam is weak and leaves indentations. I've tried flipping it and rotating it but the dent never recovered and pushes my back out of alignment. I was really upset given the thousands of glowing reviews. Now I wake up crabby and in pain every day. The warranty is no help at all, that should have been a red flag for me. I will make sure to pick my next mattress with a warranty that stands behind the product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dablinski

customer_reviews.title: Gets too hot
customer_reviews.text: It is an okay mattress. I had high expectations after the reviews but turned out to be a disappointment. It is just too firm to the point of being uncomfortable and gets extremely hot. I don't know how to solve the issue of it getting too hot, since I can't return it without the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Started great, then got misshapen
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for 2.5 years. It started out great! Medium firmness, very comfortable. About a year in, though, I started to notice that this product wasn't bouncing back the way it should and that the middle was regularly 'higher' than either side where we regularly sleep. We've rotated the bed but it hasn't helped. Moving toward the center also doesn't help because then you're left sleeping on an incline. Obviously an economically-priced mattress is never going to last 15 or 20 years, but I certainly would have hoped it would have been comfortable and done its job for more than 1 year! Disappointed with how it's held up.
customer_reviews.author: Allison S

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is definitely not 6 inches. It came to about 4 1/2 inches and is just stuck in a cover pretty much. I was super disappointed in the quality. Amazon made it right in no time though!
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Terrible mattress and company
customer_reviews.text: We had this mattress for a year and it went bad. It had a terrible sag in the middle. My hips would hurt from sleeping in it and my husbands back would hurt. They would not give us a refund even though it has a ten year warranty. I would not recommend this company. Do not ever buy a mattress from them. They also did not respond in a responsible time frame when I would send them the information they requested.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had it 5 years now and it's still a great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Bought one in 2015 and it's still going strong. Liked it so much I bought another one in 2016 for my daughters room. It's been 5 years and I have absolutely no complaints. They even have zip off washable mattress covers. Had a costco one prior that I had to return. That one was so soft you woke up as a pretzel. These have been just right. Firm but not hard. I had a knee replacement since and am pending a hip replacement on the other side. Both were painful but not an issue on this mattress and I'm a dedicated side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress retains body heat, making sleep uncomfortable. The mattress is soft, not firm, sank into it and was unable to roll over, making sleep difficult. Hard to get up from sitting position. Returning the item was a huge hassle; first UPS did not come, then they dropped off the slip, but refused to take because the original packing was damaged and unusable. Took packing slip and item to UPS store, had to pay $21.60 for packing so item could be shipped back for return. Not worth it. Horrible experience all around.
customer_reviews.author: James Hood

customer_reviews.title: Fiberglass danger!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this mattress! I had high hopes for this mattress. However, I began to have headache/sinus issues after sleeping on it and fear that it is related to the fiberglass- yes, fiberglass, “dust” covering the entire room and floor. :( Health hazard for sure. Wishing I could get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Hilliary Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Bugs!
customer_reviews.text: I found bugs twice on two different orders, two separate matresses. I gave them a chance and after disposing of the first matress I ordered a second. They came sealed and airtight packaging. Right away my daughter had bites on her arms and legs. We removed the mattress immediately and by chance it was placed in a dark room, that's how I actually saw the little bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: firm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress and a Lucid 5 inch twin mattress. BOTH mattress have " Glass fiber" listed on the labels located on the mattress but not in the description online. The cover is definitely higher quality on the Lucid and it is much more comfortable. The Zinus cover is thin and cheap feeling. I think it will be fine since I enclosed it with a mattress protector. The mattress itself is extremely firm but good for children. It unpacked well with minimal odor. In hindsight I would have purchased the Lucid in a full, I think worth the extra 50-60$. The only complaint is my daughter says she gets hot at night on this new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Worst Mattress EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst of the worst. We have had memory foam mattresses before and this by far takes the prize for worst of the worst. You honestly get what you pay for here. My husband is about 220lbs and I'm about 170 once this mattress gets warm you sink in a hole as deep as the mattress. My body has been contorted in ways I thought only my imagination was capable of thinking up. Forget about rolling over or repositioning you're stuck. Take a pass on this one and spend more somewhere else. If you don't take my word for it, keep in mind they have a 100 day trial that I missed by 19 days. Don't be me.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffytoodle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves these mattresses. I had bought one for the guest room and many complimented that slept on it. Said it was awesome. I slept on it too and loved it. No aches and pains sleeping on it. Decided to replace our pillowtop Serta and it was a great decision. I just found out that my german shepherd snuck in the guest room and decided to sleep on it too! Guilty because we found her fur on the cover, so I guess its dog approved too!
customer_reviews.author: Keepitsimple

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Really, we have not had this mattress long enough to do a thorough review but I wanted to upload the unboxing video. For reference, I’m 5’4” and the actual length of the video was @ 5 minutes (sped up for time’s sake). The photo was taken a few minutes after unboxing. We purchased this for our 13 year old and he said it slept great! I don’t anticipate having any real issues with the mattress. There wasn’t much a “smell” during unboxing. Our sheets for the mattress are a little loose but you can get clips to hold the sheets in place if that’s a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait before I reviewed so now we are barely past a year- I purchased March 2019 by January 2020 I spent good money to get a proper mattress. Not only am I now seeing all these fiber glass claims which makes ALOT OF SENSE. Because between me and my Child our Asthma has gotten worse and I’ve actually had a lot of sleepless nights, you shouldnt be allowed to sell this product someone can get very sick.
customer_reviews.author: Sharde

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This was opened within two hours of receipt. It's been three, full days laid out flat, and the "8-inch" mattress, at its fattest point (the middle) is still at 6-1/2" since yesterday. The very head and foot expanded to a mere 4". If I had the time in our cabin, I would return this. It's not what was advertised, not even close. And it's an inch wider than a standard twin, so would have to be cut to fit. I don't know how anything this off from its description gets 4-1/2 stars. A complete waste of money and time. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: FreeAtLast

customer_reviews.title: Itchy and hot
customer_reviews.text: ITCHY even through the sheets! And HOT. It was like sleeping on top of a fire. It retains every bit of heat you produce. Not enough support, either. It was so soft that it would hurt my back often. I couldn’t stand it after three months and had to buy a new mattress. Total waste of moneyZ
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Pace

customer_reviews.title: Fiberglass everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my kid's trundle bunk about two years ago. Just this week, my five year old and six year old managed to rip a hole in the stretchy thin elastic mattress cover, and now there are fiberglass particles all over the house and everyone is complaining about being itchy. I read that once fiberglass particles contaminate your house that it is impossible to fully decontaminate, and now I'm worried about everyone's lungs. There should be huge warning labels about the presence of fiberglass in these mattresses before buying. Shame on this company. The mattress also sleeps really hot
customer_reviews.author: Eileen James

customer_reviews.title: Be sure it is not an “old” stock product
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have tried to return this item. It was packaged in 2018 and the memory foam did not expand as expected. Never reached the 8 inches. And there is a long lump where it was folded.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Wife love it, I hate it. But it is a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mattress. We’ve had it for a year. Its held up good, its to firm for me but perfect for her. She’d give it a 5 for comfort, I give it a 2, but if you like a firmer mattress it’s great. I’m a muscular gentleman so I have lots of curves, so all I do is roll back and forth all night trying to get comfortable . Wife never moves. Doesn’t stink when new. True to size. It’s definitely worth the money if you prefer a firmer matress.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Not very long-lasting, but good while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Most mattresses last 8 to 10 years. This one has not lived up to that, growing thinner and more painful by the day after less than four years, but while I've had it it has served its purpose well. At first it was amazingly comfortable and even as it's on it's last legs there are just a few divots where it is painful to lie for too long, but many spots and positions in which you can get a good night's sleep. Definitely a good first mattress for a young adult, and a good idea for anyone who is not able to spend a lot of money on the mattress
customer_reviews.author: Alex Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I read the negative reviews about the fiberglass shards so I almost didn't buy this mattress. However, I had slept on one at my daughter's house for two weeks, so I checked. NO FIBERGLASS! It was extremely comfortable. When I received mine, I removed the plastic wrapping as directed. I was really concerned that the mattress was only about 4-5 inches thick after unwrapping it, but after about 12 hours, it was a full 10" thick. I would definitely recommend this mattress to others.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: This mattress was retired after two months of use because ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was retired after two months of use because it showed up at my house covered in mold! It was insane. I scrubbed it off but it grew and grew and I wasn't able to salvage it and had to buy a whole new bed. I spent way too much money that had to get thrown out. I don't make a lot and it broke my heart, really.
customer_reviews.author: Moonchild

customer_reviews.title: Worst mattress ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most uncomfortable mattress I’ve ever slept on. I have a bad back and most of the reviews said it was “GREAT FOR BAD BACKS”. Haha. That’s a lie. I wake up in the morning and can’t move. I’ve tried putting it on the floor instead of on my box springs and I’m getting the same results. I even bought a flat board to go in between the mattress and box springs and still can’t move in the morning. I’ve tried different areas of the mattress, like laying directly in the middle of the bed and still it’s so uncomfortable. My back is worse now than it was sleeping on my 10 year old mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Rae 85 15

customer_reviews.title: More firm than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3/5 because I don’t hate it but it’s Way more firm than I expected. I slept on this exact mattress but as a king at my boyfriends house and it was so amazing I had to have one but mine is no where near as soft as his. It’s not bad enough to return but I am a little disappointed and confused as to how they could feel so different for the same bed. Wondering if maybe the company changed the mattress or sent me something different?
customer_reviews.author: jennifer chambers

customer_reviews.title: Replaced factory RV mattress
customer_reviews.text: We replaced the factory "mattress" in our RV with this Queen 8" Zinus foam mattress. Compared to the 6" factory wad of polyester they give you to sleep on, this foam mattress is heaven. I like the multiple layers with the bottom layer being the firmest, which keeps your hips from htting the wood base. Also, it's medium firm, which is great for side sleepers - I don't feel like I'm in a cocoon and can turn easily on it. I will not remove the zippered cover (as the tag on it clearly states) and I put a mattress pad on top of it for a little extra padding and mattress protection. C'est bon!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Cass

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I'm somewhat disappointed, the mattress is nearly 2" wider than advertised as this is for a motorhome and every inch of space is needed. I made new cabinets (night stands) for a full size mattress rather than our queen. I made the bed platform at 54" wide which is a full size . This mattress is nearly 56" wide, if it's not comfortable it's going back. So tired of getting things that are not as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Dean J. Hauser

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love love
customer_reviews.text: Did I mention I love this mattress? It is ridiculously comfortable. Best memory foam I've ever had. Been sleeping on it for a week and it is beyond worth it. Especially at the price point. The firmness level is pretty damn perfect. If you're a side sleeper like I am you must give this product a chance. The firmness is not too hard or too soft. It's just right ! What a lucky find. Glad it worked out. It would have been a pain in the rear to return it. I guess I will post a review update at the 6th month mark to see if the quality is consistent. But so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: For the price a great mattress. Bought it and cut it down a ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price a great mattress. Bought it and cut it down a bit (with an electric carving knife) so that it fits our RV Double/Queen berth. Sits directly on firm base but soooo much better than the mattress we had before, I think we sleep better than on our mattress at home.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Jones

customer_reviews.title: Decent mattress
customer_reviews.text: After 72 hours my 8 inch mattress only expanded to 6.5 -7inches. The mattress is firm. I do not think you should expect luxury out of a $180 mattress. I have purchased expensive mattresses and did not sleep comfortably. With that said, this is why I purchased this really affordable mattress and I added a 3inch memory foam topper. Now I sleep comfortably without spending thousands. I had to purchase the 8in mattress because my bed is quite high and I didnt want to use a stool to climb into bed. Overall I am satisfied with my purchase because with the topper, the height and comfort level are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for a week now and absolutely love it! I've had 3 back surgeries and suffer from severe chronic pain, when I would get up from my old mattress, I would be in a lot of pain and my joints were stiff. With this mattress, when I get up, I'm not hurting a d my joints isn't stuff. And the price is great and made from high quality material. I highly recommend this mattress, especially if you have a bad back. It offers good firm support without being to firm and just the right amount of softness. If my opinion/experience changes, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this six months ago for my mother. At first she loved it and found it very comfortable. She weighs 122 lbs. Now the mattress sags in the middle and she wakes with a back ache every morning. Her platform is adjustable. (Wondering if a foam mattress can withstand daily raising and lowering) She does use it to sit up in bed to watch tv daily. I know the bed was inexpensive but in my research I cannot find a difference in high density foam quality. I just don't think foam mattresses are made to hold up long term.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget

customer_reviews.title: Terrible choice DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my guest room - my mother been sleeping on it for a month now and she told me how uncomfortable the mattress is. It’s way too soft, you can’t sit on the edge it just sinks in all the way you start feeing the bed frame, it’s uncomfortable for the back... I seriously DO NOT RECOMMEND IT. Pay little more and get something else; i wish i knew earlier it’s that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Georges

customer_reviews.title: Very , VERY firm
customer_reviews.text: I personally like a firm bed, but this is on the firm side even for me. We got it for my son's room, so I only lay on it to read bedtime stories, I have back pain from being pregnant, and this doesn't relieve it. I feel like it's like laying on a carpeted floor, pressure points start to hurt after a while. Luckily my son was just moving up to this from a very hard crib mattress so he likes it
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Worst mattress I've ever slept on
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased an 8" Zinus mattress, and while I wasn't expecting it to be amazing, it was reasonably firm and comfortable. This time I purchased a 6" and it was much, much worse. Mine has weird lumpy corners (yes, it's fully expanded), and you sink into it when laying down, not in a good way. Not at all firm, just barely comfortable enough for regular sleep. For this price though, I guess it's not terrible. Would not purchase again though. Update: After a few months, I now have crippling back pain. Have never had that before. Avoid this shitty mattress at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Guzi

customer_reviews.title: Temporary Mattress Only
customer_reviews.text: As I expected, you get what you pay for. What can one expect for a $200 bed? It started out fine, but started breaking down after a few months. The sag in the middle was very evident by six months where I tried sleeping on the mattress in one-third’s for seven nights and rotate across. At 12mo it was time for a new mattress, so uncomfortable that I was losing sleep each night. This mattress is definitely a temporary solution and I wouldn’t even recommend for a guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Jardy

customer_reviews.title: 3rd one we’ve purchased for family
customer_reviews.text: Third mattress of this brand we’ve purchased. A king for me and the Mrs (giggity) and a twin for each kid. Very comfy, no complaints. We’ve taken off the covers to wash and I don’t understand the negative reviews mentioning the fiber glass. I call BS! Very happy. Firm yet let’s you melt into it. Ahhhh.
customer_reviews.author: Itsrob11

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT okay.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be great for my back issues (I have peripheral and diabetic neuropathy), but it was not. This mattress is very uncomfortable and was very hard for me to move around in and get out of bed. I have gone back to a wrapped innerspring mattress and have better support. I will be getting a 2 inch memory foam mattress topper and I think I'll be good to go. This was my first memory foam mattress and am sorry that it hasn't worked out for the better.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful DEAL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is wonderful! It was delivered on time and packaged wonderfully. It had serval layers of plastic with lots of information about the product. Unboxing the mattress it took only a couple of hours to reach it's full height 10". It's softer than I had expected however I bought this mattress for my son who has a peculiar back. He is also 6foot and weighs about 120lbs. He has nothing but great things to say about it. He has slept in it for about 4 days now and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Last minute purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son was coming home from college and we didn't want to have to lug his bed and mattress home so I bought this mattress and a platform bed frame. He said it was comfortable. I wasn't sure because I bought a 10 inch before and it was wonderful so I wasn't sure about this 8 inch mattress, but it is very comfortable and he gets a great night's sleep with all of his laptops and electronics with him. I am heavier than my son and I don't feel the bed frame when I sit or lay across it. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Dont But! Spend a little more and you could get a decent night sleep
customer_reviews.text: Bought a zinus frame in the past and loved it! Was downgrading beds and thought that I should get their frame and mattress. Just don't do that. These mattress are the worst. Any review that says other wise is paid for or lieing. Mine after 3 days of airing out still had a strong odor to it and made it impossible for me to sleep or even spend 5 minutes in me bed room. I couldn't stand it and needed sleep so i threw it out plus anything that remotely had the odor on it and started fresh with an actual decent mattress. Zinus had lost my buisness.
customer_reviews.author: Dillin Elliott

customer_reviews.title: caused me some long term pain
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a softer bed, like a plush pillowtop fluff of the heavens whatever. This was super hard, slept on it for about a year and years later I have lasting pain in my neck and back every time I sleep on the side I slept on it most (I have a deviated septum and tend to prefer sleeping on a particular side). Slept on the ground/floor/hammocks for years with no issues then acquired issues from this bed. Also impossible to get someone to come take it away once you need to leave the apartment - very heavy
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: 10 inch Memory Foam Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got the 10 inch queen size mattress, had it about two weeks now, and it’s very comfortable....I don’t consider it firm, but it does support me well, and I haven’t had any soreness or issues....overall it’s a tremendous value. I really thought, that thicker was better, with memory foam Mattresses, (but I bought a 6 inch mattress recently very comfortable as well) this bed at 10 inches thick will be hard to beat in comfort. This 10 inch mattress took only about 5 minutes to expand to its size, after opening. I let it set overnight before using it....
customer_reviews.author: Timber59

product_meta.title: Zinus 10 Inch Ultima Memory Foam Mattress / Pressure Relieving / CertiPUR-US Certified / Bed-in-a-Box, Full
product_meta.description: Size:Full| Style Name:10 InchThere’s no comfort quite like the kind you get from a big hug. The Ultima Memory Foam Mattress delivers just that - enveloping comfort that fits your shape like a glove to soothe you to sleep. Created with a special blend of high quality foam layers, it features our famous green-tea and charcoal infused memory foam for a mattress that stays fresh and odor-free over time. An airflow-boosting layer of cradling comfort foam and a durable high-density foam base layer finish off this fine-tuned system of top quality foams so your body’s curves are supported and allowed to rest naturally, leading to sounder sleep with no more aches and pains. This skillfully crafted design arrives at your doorstep in one wondrous package and instantly begins to expand to its original glory once unboxed; it’s as simple as that! Already loved and highly rated by thousands of happy customers, the Ultima mattress includes a 10-year worry-free warranty, so you can be sure that it will put both your body and mind at rest.
feature_bullets: Green Tea-infused Memory Foam With a Soft, Poly Jacquard Cover

INSPIRED BY NATURE - Wholesome and natural ingredients, like green tea and moisture-absorbing charcoal work wonders in a mattress! And we’ve designed this one to control odors, maintain freshness, and envelop your shape so you awake restored and refreshed

PRESSURE-RELIEVING FOAMS - 3 inches conforming memory foam, 2 inches airflow-enhancing comfort foam, and 5 inches durable, high density base support foam; ideal for stomach sleepers and petite to average-weight sleepers
CERTIPUR US CERTIFIED - Highest quality foam is CertiPUR US Certified for durability, performance, and content

EXPERTLY PACKAGED - Our technology allows this mattress to be efficiently compressed into one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll and this mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape within 72 hours
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars22,681 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: Green Tea-infused Memory Foam With a Soft, Poly Jacquard Cover
